slider.title: More languages, more listings, more leads

list.title: GLEX instantly converts your site into a multi language, global real estate portal
list.text: No need to worry about inventory, impress your clients with the thousands of international listings on your website, branded to you and there to support you in referral revenue.

list.title: Every listing from your entire brand global inventory is branded to you, as the website owner
list.text: Just like IDX, all the global listings on your website will be branded with you, showing your clients the impressive property selection and footprint you have to offer.

list.title: Anyone viewing any listing on your site, in any market, displayed in any language, can register as a lead in your client area.
list.text: Show your clients the world and support them as you would a client looking to buy locally. Your website provides you the tools to support your clients easily, whatever their needs.

list.title: Convert the lead into a referral in your brand network, and start monetizing the global footprint of your brand
list.text: When you have a client interested in an international purchase, you can easily pass that client through your brand referral network, sign a commission contract and enjoy your new revenue stream

list.title: The biggest names in real estate rely on us for listings portal design
list.text: We know how to make listings shine online, and we do it 19 languages, for brokerages with offices on 6 continents. That’s why GLEX is exclusive to Xomio.

list.title: Choose from a range of beautiful designs with clean, modern listings and photo presentation
list.text: If you don’t have your own graphics we make sure you have access to everything you need to define your style and customise your xomio website.

list.title: Listings data is organized on the page thematically, for a clearer consumer experience
list.text: We make sure to keep your website consistent and high-end so you can enjoy playing with the details.

list.title: Advanced client features give users the ability to find, save and share their ideal property, all from your site
list.text: It’s important for clients to easily understand your properties information and we make the most of the listing details you provide and make sure that’s clearly visible and organized.

slider.title: We speak real estate, in 20 languages
slider.text: We’ve been working with listings in 20 languages for 20 years.We know everything there is to know about listings data, and about real estate translation.

list.title: Every brand listing in 19 languages
Metadata for SEO in all languages
list.text: Your brokerage brand’s listings data is translated to deliver Search Engine Optimization in 19 languages. Now every listing in your brand’s global inventory is working to get your site seen by visitors from around the world.

list.title: Set up your GLEX feed in 3 clicks
list.text: We work with our brand partners to standardise and import their listings data from around the world, with feeds from over 60 countries on 6 continents. Integrating all these listings into your site is as easy a clicking a few buttons to validate your brand membership. Turn your Xomio site into a global portal in moments.

list.title: Choose from a range of display styles
list.text: Xomio’s customizable blocks let you choose from a range of beautiful listings display options that will look great to visitors in every language.

list.title: Listings data organized thematically
list.text: Unlike most real estate platforms, we care about listings data, and we know how its display can affect the consumer experience. That’s why the biggest names in global real estate use us for their global portal design. We categorize and display all listings data thematically, so the presentation makes sense to international visitors.

list.title: Fully customize the content of your GLEX feed
list.text: Filter the listings in your GLEX feed to ensure that you show only the properties, locations and price ranges that make sense for the type of leads that you want to generate. Limit the range of available languages to the ones that are most important to your market.

features.title: Ready
features.text: Pick your preferred Xomio package and claim your GLEX feed

features.title: Set
features.text: Choose from a range of clean, modern listings search and display templates

features.title: Go!
features.text: Publish your site with a click, and start getting seen by local and international buyers

features.title: Set your style and home page
features.text: Pick the perfect foreground image or video, and choose from a range of fonts and styles.

features.title: Drag and drop blocks
features.text: Blocks are the bricks that your site is made from — drag & drop them to organize your pages

features.title: Get into the details...or don’t!
features.text: You can pick your own featured listings, and write your own text and headers. Or let our smart selections do it for you!

features.title: Publish internationally!
features.text: Launch your website in 20 languages with a single click.

steps.title: Features that deliver engagement
steps.description: Your clients’ dashboard is packed with features that keep them on your site

steps.title: Better experience, better insights
steps.description: Even the registration flow is engaging! Clients sign up using an interactive questionnaire that gives you insight into their needs

steps.title: Collections and saved searches
steps.description: Save them into customizable collections and share them to your social media, or to friends and family

steps.title: CRM with kanban view
steps.description: Stay on top of all your clients and leads

steps.title: Detailed client profiles
steps.description: See which listings clients have collected or saved and suggest other properties they might like

steps.title: Customize your IDX or GLEX
steps.description: Only want to show listings in a certain price bracket, or in certain areas? Xomio lets you pick and choose what makes it on to your site.

workflow.title: We import your Brand or MLS listings into our Listings Translation Module
workflow.text: We import your Brand or MLS listings directly from them, with no data loss. Every term is mapped exactly into the world’s largest translation module for real estate specific terminology.

workflow.title: 21 years of expertise is applied to deliver listings translation in 19 languages
workflow.text: We have been translating listings for the biggest names in global real estate for over two decades. Our listings module contains listings from over 60 countries and powers the international presence of many of the biggest international brokerages and brands.

workflow.title: Foreign language search engines index your listings and drive consumers to your Xomio site
workflow.text: Listings data in translation is used to power foreign language SEO. Now your site can be indexed on search engines used by the majority of internet users who don’t speak English - including many American residents.

workflow.title: When a foreign language visitor views your Xomio site, listings are displayed in translation
workflow.text: Visitors are automatically shown the relevant language version of your site, letting them search for homes in the same language they speak at home.

workflow.title: Consumers find and view the listings they are interested in, registering and receiving your multi language marketing mails
workflow.text: Every client facing feature is available in all of our 19 supported languages. And once they become a lead, they will receive all of their listing alerts and other emails in their chosen language too, delivering a more enjoyable client experience.

slider.title: Setting up your IDX should be simple. With Xomio, it is.
list: Why do other website builders make it so hard to integrate your IDX?
The team behind Xomio have been integrating listings feeds for over 20 years, in 19 languages, and in over 60 countries
We know everything there is to know about listings data, so we do all the hard stuff for you
Get IDX on your site, beautifully arranged on the page in just a few clicks

slider.title: Design, without the messy bits
list: Many of the biggest names in real estate rely on us for our web design skills, because we understand how to make listings shine online.
Choose from a range of beautiful designs with clean, modern listings presentation.
Listings data is organized on the page thematically, for a clearer consumer experience.
Advanced features give clients the ability to find, save and share their ideal property, all from your site.

slider.title: Listings translation you can rely on
list: We translate millions of listings per day for the biggest names in real estate
Every translation in our listings memory is provided and checked by industry specialist translators.
We use listings in translation to create metadata: the information that search engines like Google and its foreign language versions use to index your page.
Your business will finally be visible to every potential client, regardless of the language they speak, or what search engine they use.

slider.title: More languages, more listings, more leads
list: Hispanic homebuyers are the fastest growing homeownership demographic in the US
22% of American residents speak a language other than English at home
Overseas investors and foreign language speakers buy real estate in every price bracket from luxury to affordable first homes
More languages? More views, more leads, more deals. It’s that simple.

values.title: Accessibility
values.text: We build technology and websites with inclusivity at the forefront. We enable multi language content and accessibility features that cater to all.

values.title: Collaboration
values.text: As a fully remote team across four continents, we walk the walk of global collaboration! We are committed to helping real estate professionals work together and co-market across borders and language barriers.

values.title: Service
values.text: We are all about excellence in customer service, both for our own clients, and our clients’ clients! Our tools are designed to make it as easy as possible to engage and deliver for the people who matter most to your business.

values.title: Family
values.text: We remain family owned and run, after 20 years in the business. This means that we aren’t chasing short term profits at the expense of long term quality and stability, and that our clients are our most important stakeholders.

teams.title: QA
teams.text: Every new feature, product or design passes our Quality Assurance process. We are power users who test every Immobel product in every possible way to find flaws that need fixing, and to recommend ways to make user experience better.

teams.title: Frontend
teams.text: In the frontend team, we turn the Design team’s work into reality, hooking it up to all the cool features built by the Backend team. Our goal at all times is to create the best possible User Experience for our users, and for the people who visit the websites that are powered by products like Xomio.

teams.title: BA
teams.text: In the Business Analyst team, our goal is to take great ideas for new features, document them, and plan how to build them. We work with every team, coordinating across all the departments to bring a new idea to life.

teams.title: Partnership
teams.text: Successful businesses always depend on successful partnerships. We work closely with the Customer Success team to make sure that our enterprise clients and distribution partners have all the resources they need to successfully roll out our products to their own members and clients

teams.title: DevOps
teams.text: In the Business Analyst team, our goal is to take great ideas for new features, document them, and plan how to build them. We work with every team, coordinating across all the departments to bring a new idea to life.

teams.title: Backend
teams.text: We are the Backend team! Our job is to build all the technology, systems and microservices under the hood in every single Immobel product. We are a team of software developers spread across the globe, and we are passionate about making highly functional tools that deliver great value to our users.

teams.title: Design
teams.text: In the Business Analyst team, our goal is to take great ideas for new features, document them, and plan how to build them. We work with every team, coordinating across all the departments to bring a new idea to life.

teams.title: Customer Success
teams.text: We handle everything customer-facing, from onboarding new MLS data, to helping users get the most out of their Xomio website or Referral Network with training, support and documentation.

slides.title:
You’re a real estate expert.
Not a

list.title: Just clicking. No coding.
list.text: Xomio takes away all the pain and frustration of launching a website. Just select the features you like best, customize in a few clicks, and publish your site.

list.title: Your IDX and Brand listings integrated automatically
list.text: With Xomio, you don’t need any technical wizardry to add your IDX or Brand listings. We’ve done the work for you, and we’ll get your listings live in a few minutes.

list.title: Drag and drop to rearrange web pages
list.text: With Xomio, you don’t need any technical wizardry to add your IDX or Brand listings. We’ve done the work for you, and we’ll get your listings live in a few minutes.

list.title: Launch your customised website in minutes
list.text: Take longer with the customization if you want. But if speed and convenience are what you’re after, you can have a sleek, multi-language, IDX website in only 15 minutes.

slides.title:
You’re a real estate expert.
Not a

list.title: All listings translated into 20 languages
list.text: Translation for real estate is about more than just matching words. Our translators know the right terms to use in every supported language, delivering consistent information to consumers everywhere.

list.title: Translated by human industry experts
list.text: All our translations are provided and checked by human translators with real estate expertise.

list.title: Website sections in 19 languages
list.text: Every customizable block is available in all supported languages. Your site looks the same to every visitor regardless of the language they speak..

list.title: SEO & Meta tagging in all languages
list.text: Listings data in translation is used to power search engine rankings in foreign languages to reach the majority of internet users who don’t speak English. Something that translation plugins cannot deliver.

list.title: Currency & measurements conversion
list.text: It’s about more than just languages. Every visitor can view any listing in the currency and units of measurement that make sense to them.

list.title: Multi language client interface
list.text: All our client facing features, from listings collections and saved searches, to automated listings alert emails, are all available in every supported language. More languages, more leads.

slides.title:
You’re a real estate expert.
Not a

list.title: Beautiful designs straight out of the box
list.text: With Xomio, you don’t have to choose between a clunky DIY design and paying an expensive designer. Every customized site looks great, in just a few clicks.

list.title: Apply consistent styles across your whole site
list.text: No need to hunt around for text boxes and color blocks. With Xomio, style changes are applied across your entire website in a single click, for a consistent look and feel.

list.title: Videos and animations deployed with a click
list.text: You don’t need a $100k budget to have to have high end animations on your website. We make sure you have access to design features that keep visitors visually engaged, and on your site for longer.

list.title: Fully responsive sites for mobile, tablet and desktop
list.text: Half of internet usage is now on mobile. Xomio lets you preview how your site looks on any tablet or smartphone. And it looks great.

slides.title:
You’re a real estate expert.
Not a

list.title: ADA Compliance
list.text: All Xomio sites are 100% ADA-Compliant to standard WCAG 2.1 in every supported language. Never worry about an ADA lawsuit again.

list.title: Fair Housing
list.text: Every realtor talks the talk on Fair Housing. But a Xomio site does the talking for you - in 19 languages. Reach every community in your market with the same information on housing..

list.title: Accessibility is more than just a buzzword
list.text: It’s a legal liability if you get it wrong, and good business if you get it right. More accessibility means more people can access your listings, and more become leads. It’s that simple.

slides.title: Take a deeper look
slides.subtitle: A website experience that boosts conversion
text: Xomio sites are accessible to clients from any device, in their preferred language, localized according to their preferences.
The feature-rich user experience encourages visitors to save searches, create listings mood boards, share properties to their social media, and more.
Xomio’s user interface, translated listings, and multi language emails increase conversion and engagement thanks to a more personalized client journey.

slides.title: Take a deeper look
slides.subtitle: More languages + more listings =  more leads
text: Listings data drives search engine rankings in every supported language, leading more consumers to your site, and giving them more to see when they arrive.
Xomio is the only website platform that allows you to show the listings from your brand AND MLS, all branded to you.
Every listing is available in 20 languages, localized by professional translators specializing in real estate.

slides.title: Take a deeper look
slides.subtitle: Compliance, without the headaches
text: All Xomio sites are ADA-compliant, following WCAG 2.0 standards, delivering accessibility and eliminating costly fines and lawsuits.
Multi language listings show your commitment to Fair Housing and diversity, with listings fully accessible to all prospective buyers searching in your market.
Data protection, terms & conditions, CAPTCHA security — it’s all been taken care of for you.

slides.title: Take a deeper look
slides.subtitle: Better lead management means more <span class="text-primary">sales
text: Xomio’s Kanban CRM makes it easy to handle leads and follow up with clients.
Drag and drop your contacts to track their status, helping you stay on top of your pipeline.
Automated drip marketing, multi-language email auto-responses, and saved search alerts keep clients engaged with minimal effort.
